Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Understandable \Un`der*stand"a*ble\ ([u^]n`d[~e]r*st[a^]nd"[.a]*b'l), a. Capable of being understood; intelligible. --Chillingworth. [1913 Webster]
understandable adj : capable of being apprehended or understood [syn: {apprehensible}, {intelligible}, {graspable}, {perceivable}]
